decks.notes: This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on ramping up quickly with mana acceleration cards like Utopia Sprawl and Arbor Elf to cast powerful threats early on. The deck includes land destruction spells like Mwonvuli Acid-Moss and Stone Rain to disrupt the opponent's mana base while deploying aggressive creatures like Avenging Hunter and Annoyed Altisaur to quickly close out the game. Malevolent Rumble can help clear the way for your creatures to attack, while Eldrazi Repurposer provides versatility in dealing with opponent's threats. Overall, this deck aims to be fast, disruptive, and overwhelming in its aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using Urza's lands to generate a large amount of mana. The deck utilizes artifacts to help control the board and generate value, while also having ways to pressure the opponent's life total. It also has a strong reanimation theme with cards like Myr Retriever and Eviscerator's Insight. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent and grind them out over the course of the game while maintaining control of the board.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on efficient creatures and artifact synergy to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. The deck includes burn spells like Galvanic Blast and Lightning Bolt to deal damage and control the board. Creatures like Glint Hawk and Kor Skyfisher provide value by returning artifacts to hand, while Refurbished Familiar and Experimental Synthesizer can be sacrificed for additional benefits. The deck aims to be fast and disruptive, keeping up pressure on the opponent to secure a victory.

The main focus of this deck is to combo off with Persistent Petitioners by using cards like Masked Vandal and Pond Prophet to support the strategy. The deck also includes ways to generate card advantage and mana acceleration with cards like Winding Way and Simic Growth Chamber. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of Persistent Petitioners, while maintaining board presence and disrupting the opponent's game plan with versatile creatures like Generous Ent and Universal Automaton. The deck aims to win through a combination of creature beats and milling out the opponent.

The Boros Aggro deck focuses on utilizing cheap creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By efficiently deploying threats and controlling the board with removal spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The deck also incorporates artifact synergies and bounce effects to provide additional value and flexibility in its strategy. Overall, the deck seeks to apply early pressure, maintain a steady stream of threats, and close out the game with direct damage spells.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly flood the board with Elves and use their abilities to generate mana and boost each other's power. By constantly replenishing your hand with cards like Lead the Stampede and Distant Melody, you can maintain a steady stream of threats on the battlefield. Utilizing cards like Timberwatch Elf and Wellwisher can help you stay ahead in the game by enhancing your creatures and gaining life. This deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with a swarm of Elves and secure victory through aggressive tactics.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying threats and disrupting the opponent's strategy with a combination of removal spells and artifact creatures. By sacrificing artifacts and creatures for additional value and card advantage, the deck can overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of threats and disruption. The use of land destruction and graveyard hate adds another layer of disruption to the deck, making it difficult for opponents to establish a stable board state. Overall, the deck aims to pressure opponents with aggressive plays while disrupting their game plan at the same time.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. It focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent's life total while controlling the board with removal spells like Chain Lightning, Lightning Bolt, and Fireblast. Clockwork Percussionist and Thermo-Alchemist provide additional damage over time, while Experimental Synthesizer and Voldaren Epicure can generate card advantage. The deck aims to quickly close out the game before the opponent can stabilize, making it a fast-paced and relentless aggro deck.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game using gates as a mana base while using cards like Counterspell, Journey to Nowhere, and Prismatic Strands to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes card draw with Brainstorm and Deep Analysis, as well as creatures like Guardian of the Guildpact and Squadron Hawk for additional defense and offense. By effectively managing resources and controlling the battlefield, this deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure the win in a 1 vs 1 Pauper format.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and creatures with disruptive abilities. With the goal of outlasting the opponent and eventually taking over the game with powerful finishers like Gurmag Angler and Thorn of the Black Rose. The deck also includes card draw and filtering spells to ensure consistency in drawing the necessary answers. The mana base is carefully crafted to support the control strategy, with a mix of utility lands and a heavy emphasis on blue mana sources.

The main focus of this deck is to assemble the pieces needed to generate a large amount of mana with High Tide and efficiently dig through the deck to find key combo pieces using cantrips like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Preordain. Once the combo pieces are in hand, the deck can go off by chaining spells together with Psychic Puppetry and Vizier of Tumbling Sands to generate an overwhelming amount of mana and eventually win the game through various win conditions. The deck aims to be fast and consistent in executing its combo strategy.

The focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to maintain early game aggression through low-cost creatures like Faerie Miscreant and Ninja of the Deep Hours, while protecting them with counterspells and disruptive cards like Spellstutter Sprite. The deck also utilizes card draw and evasion abilities to maintain pressure on the opponent and outmaneuver their defenses. With a mix of tempo plays and efficient threats, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to control the board through counterspells and bounce effects while quickly developing a board presence with early threats like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while utilizing card draw and selection spells to maintain consistency and pressure. Additionally, the inclusion of evasion effects like Dragon Wings and Sleep of the Dead helps to push through damage and close out games efficiently. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and aggressive in its strategy.

The main idea of this Aggro - Red Deck Wins is to consistently deal damage to the opponent quickly and efficiently. By utilizing a mix of burn spells, creatures with direct damage abilities, and efficient creatures, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize. The key strategy is to maintain a fast pace of aggression and overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of damage, making it difficult for them to recover.

The main idea of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing efficient removal and direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning, as well as gaining life with Alms of the Vein and Vampire's Kiss, the deck aims to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery provide additional ways to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while cards like Fiery Temper and Kitchen Imp help maintain pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on generating a high amount of mana quickly to enable powerful combo plays using cards like High Tide, Lórien Revealed, and Kaervek's Torch. The deck includes card draw and search spells to help find key pieces and keep the combo going. With the ability to generate a large amount of mana in a single turn, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents and finish them off with a powerful burn spell.
